A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I’m giving at least half a star because it made it to the screen; otherwise it is an abomination to the franchise. I find myself a viewer who is open to Expanding a franchises mythology\, but when you take such liberties that makes no sense and does not even reflect the internal logic of the films that came before\, that I Cannot get behind. I guess you could say this is a decent movie but a Disgrace to the Star Wars saga.
